ALBK.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Best Efforts Bank
ALBK.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Best Efforts Bank provides a range of banking services to professional market participants in Russia. The company provides single cash position and portfolio margining services; and classical banking services, such as settlement and cash services to individual entrepreneurs, individuals in private practice, and credit institutions, as well as offers deposits and loans to individuals. It also acts as an intermediary for legal entities; provides custodial services; and offers access to the trading venues of Moscow and Saint-Petersburg Exchanges. In addition, the company focuses on IT and outsourcing solutions for its clients, as well as investment banking and customer services; and providing remote identification services of the client, as well as back office services for small and medium companies. It serves approximately 40 clients. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Moscow, Russia. As of January 21, 2020, Public Joint Stock Company Best Efforts Bank operates as a subsidiary of Public Joint-Stock Company SAINT PETERSBURG EXCHANGE.

AVAN.ME.summary: AVANGARD Joint Stock BANK provides various banking products and services to individual and corporate clients in Russia. The company offers deposits, car loans, and bank and corporate cards; and securities and precious metals transaction, safe box, settlement and cash, currency control, and money transfer services, as well as Internet banking services. It is also involved in the documentary operations; and the financing of import contracts. The company operates 300 offices in 75 cities. AVANGARD Joint Stock BANK was founded in 1994 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

BSPB.ME.summary: ÂBank ÂSaint-PetersburgÂ Public Joint-Stock Company, a universal bank, provides a range of banking products and services to individuals and corporates in Russia. The company's Corporate Banking division offers payment and settlement services, corporate loans, investment banking services, risk hedging solutions, and deposits. It also provides loans to small and medium enterprises comprising working capital, purchase equipment, vehicles, real estate, and other property finance; loans to agricultural enterprises; and a range of services related to documentary operations and international trade finance, as well as develops services for Exim companies. The company's Retail Banking division offers term deposits and current accounts; payments and transfers solutions; and mortgage, car, and consumer loans, as well as issues bank cards and provides related services. Its Private Banking division provides products and services to individuals, including concierge services related to traveling, creation of wine collections, real estate purchase, and art-banking. The company's Digital Banking division offers e-banking system for retail customers; and Internet banking services through i.bspb.ru, as well as mobile banking applications. The company operates 58 offices in Saint Petersburg; 1 branch and 1 office in Moscow; and 1 branch and 5 offices Kaliningrad, as well as the Leningrad region and Novosibirsk. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Saint Petersburg, Russia.

CBOM.ME.long_name: Credit Bank of Moscow (public joint-stock company)
CBOM.ME.summary: Credit Bank of Moscow public joint-stock company provides various banking products and services in Russia. The company operates through four segments: Corporate Business, Retail Banking, Treasury, and Cash Operations. The Corporate Business segment offers corporate and overdraft lending, factoring, financial and operating leasing, letters of credit, guarantees, corporate deposit transactions, and settlements and money transfer services. The Retail Banking segment provides retail demand and term deposit services; retail lending, including cashloans, car loans and mortgages, and private banking; and banking card products, as well as settlements and money transfer services. The Treasury segment offers interbank lending and borrowings from banks, securities trading and brokerage in securities, repo transactions, and foreign exchange services, as well as issues domestic bonds and promissory notes. The Cash Operations segment engages in cash handling, calculation, and transportation activities. It operates 132 branches, 1,204 ATMs, and 7,023 payment terminals in Moscow and the Moscow region. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Credit Bank of Moscow public joint-stock company operates as a subsidiary of Limited Liability Company Concern ROSSIUM

KUZB.ME.long_name: Kuznetsky Bank Public joint stock company
KUZB.ME.summary: Kuznetsky Bank Public joint stock company provides a range of financial services to individuals, small and medium-sized enterprises, individual entrepreneurs, and private and corporate clients in Penza, Russia. It offers various deposits; loans; bank cards; consumer and mortgage lending; utility payments; coins; money transfer; settlement and cash services; guarantee; foreign exchange; safe deposit box rental; acquiring; and payroll services, as well as online and other banking services. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Penza, Russia.

KYM1.F.summary: VTB Bank (public joint-stock company), together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in Russia, OECD, and internationally. The company operates five segments: Corporate-Investment Banking, Medium and Small Banking, Retail Business, Treasury, and Other Business. It offers standard term deposits, structured deposits, promissory notes, and corporate overnight accounts, as well as placement of funds on current accounts; term loans, credit lines, overdraft loans, complex loan products, and consultancy services, as well as loans to the mining industry; and credit operations through remote banking systems. The company also provides cash management products and services; guarantees and letter of credits; documentary and clean collection services; pooling products ; factoring, leasing, pension fund, and registrar services; insurance solutions for corporates and small businesses; investment products and services, including debt and equity capital market products, corporate finance, FX and rates, securitization, commodities, credit derivatives, equities, derivatives, equity repo and structured finance, private equity and special situation solutions, infrastructure and project finance, and portfolio management services; and depository services. In addition, it offers cash and settlement, payment cards, payment processing, custody, syndication, trade and export finance, anti-money laundering and counter terrorist financing policies, construction and development services, treasury, electronic banking, and corporate cards. VTB Bank has strategic partnership with Rostelecom Secures to develop data centers and cloud business. VTB Bank (public joint-stock company) was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.

PRMB.ME.summary: Public joint-stock commercial bank Primorye provides commercial banking products and services to corporate and private customers in Russia. It offers deposit products; cash, car, housing, mortgage, and commercial loans; business financing, overdraft facility, and loan refinancing services; letter of credit and bank guarantee; and individual, salary, credit, and corporate cards. The company also provides western union transfer, settlement and cash, documentary collection, trade finance, foreign exchange control, correspondent banking, and financial management services; and currency purchase and sale, and hedging services. In addition, it offers mobile acquiring services; bank safes; securities brokerage and management; and Internet and mobile banking services. The company has branches in the cities of Ussuriisk, Nakhodka, Artem, and Wrangell, as well as in Khabarovsk, Yuzhno-Sakhalinsk, and Irkutsk; representative office in Magadan; and office in Moscow. Public joint-stock commercial bank Primorye was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Vladivostok, Russia.

RDRB.ME.long_name: The Russian Public Joint-Stock Commercial Roads Bank (Public joint-stock company)
RDRB.ME.summary: The Russian Public Joint-Stock Commercial Roads Bank (Public joint-stock company) provides various financial services in Russia. It offers various deposits and loans; and cash management, leasing, foreign trade support, trade finance, bank-client, collection, and depository services, as well as bank cards. The company also provides safe deposit boxes leasing, securities purchases and sales, conversion, collection, VIP client, and correspondent account services, as well as transfer services without opening an account. It serves road industry, farming, transporting, industrial and housing construction, building materials, trade organizations, and military industrial complex units; individuals; and partner banks. The company has two branches in Krasnodar and St. Petersburg, the Russian Federation; two additional offices in St. Petersburg; and two operating cash registers, such as one in Krasnodar and one in Moscow. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.

ROSB.ME.summary: Public joint stock company ROSBANK provides commercial and investment banking, and custodial services in Russia. The company operates through Retail Banking, Corporate Banking, and Treasury and Financial Institutions segments. It offers various banking products, including current accounts, savings and deposit products, loans and other credit facilities, mortgages, overdrafts, credit and debit cards, derivative products, and travel insurance services, as well as private banking products and services. The company also provides consumer loans; and leasing, cash management, documentary, and payroll services. In addition, it provides cash management and corporate lending services; trade finance services, which includes bank guarantees Rubles and foreign currency, letter of credit, structuring of transactions, and consulting services; investment banking services; custody services. Further, the company offers foreign exchange and money market operations; investment and risk management solutions, such as hedging; and brokerage services. Additionally, it offers factoring, processing, and telecommunication services; Internet, mobile, and phone banking services; and ATM services. The company primarily serves medium-sized trade, finance, and technology companies. As of December 31, 2019, it operated through nine branches. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public joint stock company ROSBANK is a subsidiary of SociÃ©tÃ© GÃ©nÃ©rale S.A.

SBER.ME.summary: Sberbank of Russia provides corporate and retail banking products and services to individuals, small businesses, corporate clients, and financial institutions. The company offers consumer, education, and car loans; mortgages; refinancing products; fixed- term, settlement, and online deposit accounts; trace and metal accounts; and credit, debit, bank, gift, and social cards. It also offers private and personal banking; payments services; cash and wire transfers; and foreign transfers. In addition, it offers investments and securities; brokerage and custody services; mutual funds; asset management; saving certificates and bills; safe deposit box rental; and precious metals and coins. Further it, offers travel, accident and illness, bank card, endowment life, and investment life insurance products, as well as insurance products for real estate and vehicles; and pension programs. Additionally, the company provides business bank accounts, platform for exporters and importers, merchant acquiring services, and corporate cards for small businesses; and loans, investment products and capital markets services, fund investment services, and banking services for corporate clients. It also provides trade finance, interbank lending, currency risk hedging, and treasury services; deposits, custody services, and electronic trading systems; and settlement services to financial institutions. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 11 Regional banks and 14,244 branches in Russia. The company also has operations in 18 countries internationally. Sberbank of Russia was founded in 1841 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.

USBN.ME.long_name: Public joint stock company BANK URALSIB
USBN.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company BANK URALSIB, together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services to individuals and corporate clients in Russia and internationally. The company operates through Corporate Banking Operations, Retail Banking Operations, Small Business, Leasing Operations, Financial services and Markets, Treasury and Asset-Liability Management Unit, and Corporate Investments and Other Operations segments. Its products and services include commercial lending and deposit taking, settlements and cash transactions, trade finance, and transactions with precious metals; and money transfer and foreign exchange services, and various banking card products. The company is also involved in primary and secondary equity and debt capital markets activities; brokerage services and securities trading, including repurchase agreements transactions and derivative transactions; and placement and raising of funds. In addition, it offers a range of banking services for high net worth individuals, including their savings management and financial advisory. Further, the company invests in and rents retail trade premises, completed residential apartments, residential buildings under construction, and land; manages properties; and provides leasing and management services. It operates through a network of 6 branches. Public Joint Stock Company BANK URALSIB was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.

VTBR.ME.summary: VTB Bank (public joint-stock company), together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in Russia, OECD, and internationally. The company operates five segments: Corporate-Investment Banking, Medium and Small Banking, Retail Business, Treasury, and Other Business. It offers standard term deposits, structured deposits, promissory notes, and corporate overnight accounts, as well as placement of funds on current accounts; term loans, credit lines, overdraft loans, complex loan products, and consultancy services, as well as loans to the mining industry; and credit operations through remote banking systems. The company also provides cash management products and services; guarantees and letter of credits; documentary and clean collection services; pooling products ; factoring, leasing, pension fund, and registrar services; insurance solutions for corporates and small businesses; investment products and services, including debt and equity capital market products, corporate finance, FX and rates, securitization, commodities, credit derivatives, equities, derivatives, equity repo and structured finance, private equity and special situation solutions, infrastructure and project finance, and portfolio management services; and depository services. In addition, it offers cash and settlement, payment cards, payment processing, custody, syndication, trade and export finance, anti-money laundering and counter terrorist financing policies, construction and development services, treasury, electronic banking, and corporate cards. VTB Bank has strategic partnership with Rostelecom Secures to develop data centers and cloud business. VTB Bank (public joint-stock company) was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.

VZRZP.ME.summary: Vozrozhdenie Bank (PJSC) provides banking products and services in Russia. It operates through Corporate Business, Retail Business, Financial Business, and Liquidity segments. The company's deposit products include settlement and current accounts, and bills and deposit certificates. Its loan portfolio comprises individual loans, revolving loans, guarantees, overdrafts, credit lines, and other types of financing. The company also provides settlement and cash, collection, factoring, lending, foreign currency, derivative financial instruments, securities transactions, foreign exchange and custody, payroll project, ATM, and card-based services. It operates through 16 branches. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.
